duties_responsibilities.duty: Work directly with design team members on engineering projects for commercial, agricultural, and industrial facilities across the nation.
Provide expertise in heavily loaded, non-typical structures as well as commercial buildings, warehouses, and other ancillary structures.
Participate in travel with principals for on-site assessments, construction observations, and forensic investigations.

education_certification.credential: Minimum BS Degree in Civil Engineering; Structural Engineering Specialization. Professional licensing and structural design experience is a plus.
